DataElement.preferredName: New Cancer Therapy Not Reported Administration Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether a patient has started a new anticancer therapy that has not been reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: New Cancer Therapy Not Reported Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before._Treatment to stop or prevent cancer.._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._A short textual account; having provided a short account._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.:Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable
